commit.message:
Rollup merge of #99036 - TaKO8Ki:fix-test-for-88138, r=compiler-errors

Add `#[test]` to functions in test modules

I implemented a suggestion in #91770, but the ui test I created was inadequate and I have fixed that.

verification.payload:
tree 492048e05bbcd7fae4acb819ac17a999278aebba
parent 48cf43b752282d512be1a1cb664166698b5d63a8
parent 29dc72dd107a75ddc22da6b51ea96d0f9067b59f
author Yuki Okushi <jtitor@2k36.org> 1658030929 +0900
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1658030929 +0900

Rollup merge of #99036 - TaKO8Ki:fix-test-for-88138, r=compiler-errors

Add `#[test]` to functions in test modules

I implemented a suggestion in #91770, but the ui test I created was inadequate and I have fixed that.
